column1: Metadata for Electric Field: Information on how an electric field measurement was setup for a run

column2: type of electric sensor [ Ag-AgCl | Pb-PbCl | ...]
azimuth of dipole N = 0, E = 90 [ degrees ]
positive datum for x, y, z location [ WGS84 ]
negative datum for x, y, z location [ WGS84 ]
contact resistance at beginning of measurement, positive polarity [ Ohm ]
contact resistance at beginning of measurement, negative polarity [ Ohm ]
contact resistance at end of measurement, positive polarity [ Ohm ]
contact resistance at end of measurement, negative polarity [ Ohm ]
AC at start of measurement [ V ]
AC at end of measurement [ V ]
DC at start of measurement [ V ]
DC at end of measurement [ V ]
statement on how calibration for sensor was performed
units of electric field data [ counts | mV | ... ]
data quality rating based on some sort of statistic
any warnings about data quality (ie. noise sources, chewed cables, ...)
person who did QC/QA on data
any type of filter used durring recording
